summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 3.9°C) and outside temperature (down 2.6°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 8%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 726 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1426 m), feels like temperature (up 5.9°C), outside temperature (up 4.2°C), and inside temperature (up 1.6°C) when compared to today.

Today’s average cloud levels is 726.1m lower than yesterday, 559.2m lower than the past week, 1425.6m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels yesterday fell between 745m minimum and 3580m maximum, with an average of 1260.3m; weekly and monthly averages were marginally higher at 1819.5m and 2690m.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; you can expect comfortable, mild temperatures. Also, pleasant humidity levels. Possible light showers, occasional overcast conditions, and the light is absent. Changeable conditions.
